ultramirinc.champs_mood.fragments

Class SearchFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ultramirinc.champs_mood.fragments.SearchFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class SearchFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Created by Etienne Berube on 2017-03-23. This class allows the user to search for friends or potential friends on the database. It is a tab for TabActivity.

    • Nested Class Summary
